idea_name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea_text: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
project_folder: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711

assets.artwork_prompt: Create an image of a cozy living room, softly lit by a warm, golden afternoon light filtering through a nearby window. The main character, dressed in a casual brown t-shirt and dark pants, is seated comfortably on a plush sofa, holding a smartphone with a surprised expression on her face. Her eyebrows are raised, and her eyes are wide as she stares at the screen. The room is tastefully decorated with indoor plants and a small coffee table, adding a homely feel. On the phone screen, a message notification icon is visible, symbolizing the scam text. The camera angle is slightly over-the-shoulder, focusing on her reaction to convey the unexpected and puzzling nature of the situation.
assets.artwork_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/artwork.png
assets.script: "Whoa, I just got a text from a bank I don’t even use, claiming there’s an issue with my account. This is definitely a scam. Never click on suspicious links or share personal info—always double-check with your actual bank first!"
assets.audio_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/audio.mp3
assets.srt_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/subtitles.srt
assets.scenario_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/scenario.json
